timeline.message: Merge branch 'elide-5.x-metadatastore-flag' of https://github.com/yahoo/elide into elide-5.x-metadatastore-flag

timeline.bodyText: Just curious, what change in this PR would need this test case to be updated.
timeline.author: moizarafat

timeline.bodyText: Can we set this to false? I think this does not need to be true for the test cases relying on SQLUnitTest to work. If it can work with false, then it will test the other scenario that we can do analytical queries without populating /table, /column etc.
timeline.author: moizarafat

replies.bodyText: If it does not work then we need test cases which verify that we can do analytical queries without populating /table, /column etc.
replies.author: moizarafat

timeline.author: aklish
